activity.description: Summary set to WebappClassLoader: Lifecycle error : CL stopped

Operating System set to MacOS X

attachment.name: Bugzilla Comment
attachment.data:

attachment.name: Bugzilla Comment
attachment.data: According to Remy, this one isn't going to be easy to fix because it is so hard to duplicate. I'm putting it in the system in the hopes that others may help duplicate this error.
